summary: An Ordinance providing for the improvement of the Alley in Block Three (3), University Park Addition, being the alley between Seventeenth Avenue Northeast and Eighteenth Avenue Northeast, from East Fifty-second Street to East Fifty-fifth Street, all in the City of Seattle, all in accordance with Resolution No. 5855 of the City Council of the City of Seattle, creating a local improvement district therefor, and providing that payment of said improvement be made by special assessments upon property in said district payable by mode of "Payment by Bonds".
